ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (a calamitous Event) that shall turn things upside down:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: It will abase some and exalt others.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: The event will be abasing some, and exalting some.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: some shall be abased and others exalted.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (Many) will it bring low; (many) will it exalt;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: It will bring low (some); (and others) it will exalt;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: It will bring down [some] and raise up [others].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [56:3] [it will be] abasing [some], exalting [others], that is, it will manifest the abasing of some people by [virtue of] their admission into the Fire, and [manifest] the exalting of others by their admission into Paradise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Abasing (some)) due to their own works and, thus, sends them to the Fire, (exalting (others)) due to their own works and, thus, sends to the Garden. It is also said it is called the Event because of its sound which will be heard by the near and the far;
